name: Hydrapak Ultraflask 600ml
description: At 600ml, this is the largest of the Ultraflask family, but it's small enough to fit in most hydration vest pockets.  The beauty of a soft-bottle – once empty it compacts to a fraction of its full size.Removable drink tube can be cut to length.Fits in most hydration vest, belt or pack pockets.Body is 0.4mm BPA-free thermoplastic polyurethane with a nice, grippy feel.Cap configurations: high-flow, silicone bite valve mounted directly to the cap or with the strap in between.RF welded to create superior bonds.42mm opening is easy to fill, clean, or add drink mix.Can be frozen or filled with warm water (max temp 140°F / 60°C).
